level.text: The following provisions of Chapter 12 of Title 27 DCMR relating to determinations and findings shall apply to procurements by the Agency:

The provisions of § 1206.8 of Title 27 DCMR shall not apply to procurement by the Agency. Wherever certification of a determination and findings (“D&F”) is required under this title or Title 27 DCMR, the D&F shall be certified by the Executive Director.
